attributes.action: change the trips to everyone to pay and not volentary payment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition because i think its unfair that the same parents pay for the school trips because it now says voluntary payments and then if one of those parents cant pay the next time then the trip has to be canceled, also i think its not fair for only a few parents to pay for that whole class.
